Package com.megateam.common.command

Class Command

java.lang.Object
com.megateam.common.command.Command
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddCommand, ClearCommand, ExecuteScriptCommand, ExitCommand, FilterLessThanTypeCommand, HelpCommand, InfoCommand, PrintFieldDescendingPriceCommand, RemoveAnyByRefundableCommand, RemoveByIdCommand, RemoveFirstCommand, RemoveLastCommand, RemoveLowerCommand, SaveCommand, ShowCommand, UpdateCommand
public abstract class Command extends Object
Abstraction for all commands

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public abstract boolean execute() throws CommandException, DatabaseException
      This method is an abstraction for command execution method
      Returns:
      boolean status of command execution
      Throws:
      CommandException - if something went wrong during the command operations
      DatabaseException - if something went wrong during the database operations
